meanings.definition: A thing to be added or included in a document or list.
meanings.sent1: I have a few dedendums to attach to the report before submitting it.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to review all the dedendums carefully before finalizing the agreement.
meanings.sent3: The dedendums were like surprise gifts hidden in the paperwork.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were the dedendums that enriched the project.
meanings.sent5: The dedendums acted as important puzzle pieces completing the document.

meanings.definition: A clause in a legal document that specifies a condition or requirement.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer highlighted the crucial dedendums in the contract for the client.
meanings.sent2: It is essential to understand all the dedendums before signing any legal agreement.
meanings.sent3: The dedendums in the will were like secret codes waiting to be decoded.
meanings.sent4: The dedendums served as the protective shield for the rights of the parties involved.
meanings.sent5: The dedendums were the silent guardians of legal precision in the document.
